description: Inside issue 10 of 100% Biodegradable: Truckers tear their way across Hell's Highway on an ill conceived mission of mercy, a lone soldier battles invaders and isolation, two apocalypse survivors face off against the psychotic android scourge known as The Milk Machine, the return of Jim Alexander (2000ad, Metal Hurlant) and Jon Haward's (Judge Dredd Megazine, Tales Of The Buddha) popular detective series 'Sideburns', and Travis Wilson crosses the hazardous mutant filled London wastelands in the fourth instalment of John Freeman (Crucible, Judge Dredd Megazine) and Brett Burbridge's Death Duty series. All this, and more!

Basil and Moebius take an unscheduled jaunt to Instanbul to infiltrate the mysterious cult who may reveal secrets to their mystical alien tattoos and their connection to the Dropa Stones. But as dangerous as getting into the cult may be, getting out may be absolutely deadly...Part 2 in the 4-part adventure Secret of the Ancients!
name: Secret of the Ancients Part 2

description:
Alex Cooper falls into the dream world of Comatose, a world that is part dream, part game; full of action, adventure, and blood thirsty monsters. With the help of his friend Kevin he begins to make his escape from this world, but they soon discover that there is more to this world than meets the eye. Follow Kevin and Alex and their adventures in Comatose.

Chapter 2: Kevin

Alex and Kevin continue their escape from the blood thirsty monsters, and find shelter in the home of a friend of Kevin's.
name: Kevin

description: Bruce deals with his outbreak and the strange creature's visit, worried that another bigger bomb is about to drop.
After aquiring rations for her men Kerry learns that the Delta isn't going to be just another walk in the park, as all around her the Liu Hui's grasp tightens.

Rancid Mucus Covered Dog Poop

Poor Bob can't use the toilet without being interrupted. He's about to move back into his own apartment. The only catch being... It's now been super glued onto its foundation backwards. Meanwhile, That crazy saleswoman from Phredmart has brought back rock musician R.U. Nixon back from the dead and is attempting to use him as a zombie spokesperson for the company.
name: Rancid Mucus Covered Dog Poop

description:
15th Anniversary Special!

From underground web comic to digital comics hero, celebrate 15 years of Halloween Man and friends this October! This issue features four all new stories, including an all-new Tales of Solar City!

Also in this issue, evil wears many masks, but in the world of Halloween Man, pure evil wears just one! Meet the Phantom Hood, the self-proclaimed spectral sword of the high born! A special archive delievers all of the best Phantom Hood stories including one by DC comics superstar Nicola Scott!

So crawl out of your coffins and get ready to handle all of the pirate mummies, space dwarves, man eating plants, and zombies your brain can take! Because this Halloween, we're pulling out all of the stops!

F**k You Very Much

The final chapter for Beatrice, Biscuit, and Punk Rocker as they battle their way into Hell.
name: Chapter 3: F**k You Very Much

description:
Fitting In

The comfort of this new world has put an ease to Sy, staying his mind from thinking about any of the revolving questions that could define what was real or not. In this way, he goes forward. Luckily he has a great friend to accompany him. After taking in culture and history in the Desert City, Sy and Chalace set off towards the north to continue where their history was previously left. With Sy's arrival, the two seek to fulfill a seemingly life-long ambition shared by Chalace and his entire family; to be completed. Though not completely understood, Sy takes this aim to guide his purpose being here. However, he Immediately faces defiance; Chalace's brother Spaide.
name: Episode 5 - Fitting In

description: JLS makes it to his 1st fight. His opponent is a Beta Reticulan who should be an easy victory for Sullivan. An easy victory if he was listening to Buque's advice that is. John's pig-headedness and ego dominate the 1st rounds debacle and he takes his lumps. Between rounds he is berated by Mrex and Buque for his poor performance. He decides that maybe taking SOME advice wouldn't be a bad thing.

volume.name: John L. Sullivan Boston Strong Boy In Space

description: Jep and Deborah travel to Syria to try rescue Ehud from the clutches of ISIS. Will they be in time? And a new evil arises as the team forms.

Continuing on from Machineland #1 we find out who Captain Hurricane is....sort of...and we see Cillian in a race against the clock to remove a nasty head exploding beetle from his....well I won't spoil it for you all!!!

The noise of thunder, part six.

The origin of Dr. Paragon! The secret behind the Voice from the Pit begins to unveil! A glimpse of Tessa's past! All of these events have something in common...but you must read this issue to know what it is.

Mysteries! Action! Power-struggles! An enigmatic world and a colorful cast with a main character we DARE you to find in another comicbook!

Join the Manifest Universe!
name: The Noise of Thunder, Part Six

description:
A Watchful Eye

Friends and families are reunited; Emma uncovers a troubling secret.
name: A Watchful Eye

description:
Stepping Up

The bad guys step up their game by bringing in powered hitmen and attempts to kidnap the children. It's time for Paragon and Desert Fox to put a stop to them once and for all.
name: Stepping Up

description:
Office clerk and struggling superhero Lucas Barrett goes on a date with someone he met online, who isn’t fond of his costumed alter-ego. Throw-in beetle vikings, his slacker friend the Majestic Rat, and cosmic villain Rabb the Malevolent (who has an awful resemblance to a former Toronto mayor that made headlines around the world), and you’ve got excitement!

Note: The digital edition (11/25/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.

A Shadowy Reflection

Forced to return to square one, Inspectors Shelby and Bergeon must retrace their steps in order to find the missing clue that links all of these murders together. Nothing prepares them for the horrors and truths that await them in the shadows.
name: A Shadowy Reflection

description:
Temptation

Michael has an encounter with the devil that leaves him with an identity, a purpose, and the ability to wield his special power.
name: Temptation

description:
The Last Explorer

Globetrotting investigator Rob Hanes is hired to track down an explorer who disappeared decades ago in Africa while searching for a cursed diamond from the continent's colonial past.
name: The Last Explorer

description:
Orientation: Chapter 2

Cherri Makes her way to the Vampire School, the Shadow Academy and finds her New roomies!
name: Orientation: Chapter 2

description:
Fire Quest

Ravenwood and the crew race through Lifdell with their young witness, trying to escape the Royal Guard who seem unusually interested in him. Meanwhile, a Troll caravan winds its way into a surprise of their own - an ambush orchestrated by the sorcerer Molock and the Rats of Kalizar. Ravenwood and others aren't the only ones in search of the Great Seal but unfortunately the Trolls and the Rats have a better idea as to where the powerful artifact may be.
name: Fire Quest

description: An untrained Floyd suits up as TREP and goes on a risky mission to recover stolen equipment.

In the final issue of "Two Redheads & A Dead Blonde," private detective Ronan Marino realizes he missed a vital clue in the case to expose his girlfriend's murderer and works with his police friends to set a trap and draw out the guilty.

This leads to a violent three way confrontation that leaves a trail of carnage across the city of Lowell, revealing dark secrets some would rather remain hidden.

Will Ronan survive the investigation? Will he ever find true love? More importantly, will he ever find a near mint copy of "Amazing Spider-Man" #129?

This concluding issue of the hard-boiled detective series reveals all!

Three stories in 33 pages including:

THE FORGETTING pt. 4 -- The monstrous Sever suspects that events may be escalating and creates new minions to take care of the problem. Meanwhile, John and the Forgetter head west to rendezvous with The Mormons.

THE CIRCLE -- While searching for his missing roommate, young Nate receives an unexpected invitation to the party that never ends.

THE ORGAN-GRINDER pt. 5 -- Jeremiah McAlester has landed in the hoosegow and meets sheriff John "Hank" Henry, who's set to see him hang! Still on the loose, Jeremiah's partner, Moses the monkey, gets to work.
name: The Forgetting pt. 4; The Circle; The Organ-Grinder pt. 5

description: Raleigh tries desperately to avoid hurting anyone, as a darker side of his nature emerges during the night.
name: Half Breed

description:
Curse of the Cortes Stone

The Wraith, Shadowflame and Johnny Saturn spring forth from their own independent series' for an adventure only the three of them could possibly dare face. Battling against Aztekoth, The Wraith soon encounters an evil unlike any he has ever faced before--Orcus! An evil so pronounced, so powerful, that the fate of not only the world, but all existence is at stake. Soon joined by his fellow heroes, the trio battle as best they can against a galactic threat that will require the gathering of all Earth's champions to combat. Join our heroes in this rollicking adventure filled with drama, action and excitement in the best tradition of comic book storytelling. A War of the Independents crossover.
name: Curse of the Cortes Stone

volume.name: Yogi Berra the Tale of a Champion

description:
An incredibly unique comic book benefit project featuring comic shorts, pin-ups, short essays, and flash fiction, the proceeds of which will be going to the Innocence Project

We've all seen the pictures: a six-year-old Ruby Bridges being escorted by U.S. marshals on her first day at an all-white, New Orleans school in 1960; a police dog attacking a demonstrator in Birmingham; fire hoses turned on protesters; Martin Luther King Jr. addressing a crowd on the National Mall. These pictures were printed in papers, flashed across television screens, and helped to change the laws of this nation, but not necessarily all of the attitudes. Similarly, we've seen the pictures of Michael Brown lying face down in a pool of his own blood for hours; protesters with their hands up, facing down militarized policemen. There are videos of Eric Garner choked to death, John Crawford III shot down in Walmart for carrying a toy gun, and 12-year-old Tamir Rice gunned down in broad daylight for the same reason. APB: Artists Against Police Brutality is a benefit comic book anthology that focuses on hot-button issues including police brutality, the justice system, and civil rights, with one primary goal: show pictures and tell stories that get people talking. The proceeds will go to the Innocence Project, an organization dedicated to exonerating wrongfully convicted people.

Featuring Works by: Lalo Alcaraz, Keith Knight, Dean Haspiel, Barbara Brandon-Croft, Gary Phillips, Jerry Craft, Sofia Samatar, and Mondo we Langa

No one killed his partner; he's not part of a top secret government project: what if a man became a super-hero just because he knew he could? RCMP constable David Semple dons the guise of Captain Canuck to take on the Unholy Avengers, an outlaw biker gang menacing the Canadian west coast. Chapterhouse reprints the Unholy War of the West Coast Captain Canuck by Riel and Drue Langlois. Originally released in a 4-part limited series in October 2004 under Comely Comix, this 120-page Trade Paperback includes exclusive interviews and previously unseen extras.
name: TPB

description:
Return of the Black Death

In our first issue, Dracula is resurrected ten years after a defeat that saw him locked away in the crypt of the Tower of London. Returned to life - or at least to undeath - by one of his oldest rivals and a young London librarian named Thalia, Dracula is faced with a decision: Take up his mission to conquer the world of the living once again, or stand against his own kind and be destroyed!
name: Return of the Black Death

description: A series set 1000 years in the future Ellie Moonbeard and the Seekers of Shine is the tale of a young girl being raised by her single father on their space ship The Lovely Lady. Capt. Moonbeard takes Ellie and his crew racing across the galaxy seeking rare and lost treasure, hoping to learn the secrets of the Universe.
name: The Boy

volume.name: Ellie Moonbeard and The Seekers of Shine

description:
...And the door will open

"Exlibrium" (from the Latin 'ex libris', "of the books" and 'equilibrium', "balance") - a magic seal that helps the mysterious order of sorcerers to guard the border between the real world and the world of fiction. For many centuries members of the order have been successfully preventing creatures from the works of art and lliterature from escaping into our world. But sometimes the order fails to do so and some of those characters manage to break the walls between realities...
name: ...And the door will open

description:
Genesis

There is no war greater than that between Heaven and Hell...
name: Genesis

description:
The Death of GoldenGirl

A story of ageism, sexism, and greed set in a world of pseudo-reality that becomes frighteningly tragic when murder occurs at a comics convention.
name: The Death of GoldenGirl

description:
A Night of Something...

A man wakes to a friend calling him in a frenzy.

His friend fails to explain the situation. But then again it can't be easy to explain that half the world now have superpowers.

We follow Police Detective Zachary Hale on his first day in this new world, completely unprepared. Just like everyone else on the planet.
name: A Night of Something...

description: An alien child prodigy must embark on an adventure through space to find a cure for her terminal illness.

"Kitty Kat is like Jazz... If you played it with .45 caliber bullets"

The 1950s. The height of the Jazz age and all things COOL.

A world in which an up and coming female Jazz singer, must navigate among underworld mobsters, thugs, thieves, killers, and cops.

A world filled with extortion, blackmail, robberies, murder, and revenge.

Double-crosses upon double-crosses.

All in an explosive, suspense-packed 72 pages.
name: Vol. 1

description:
Plague Doctor

Igor Grom is a skilled detective from St. Petersburg, known for his daring nature and uncompromising attitude towards the criminals of all kinds. Incredible strength, analytical mind and integrity - these qualities make Grom the perfect policeman. Working tirelessly, he always pushes the matter through, and meets the challenges standing in the way.
name: Plague Doctor Part 1

description:
Opposite Day

Morgan Le Fay arrives in the present day, wreaking as much havoc as she can. Soon it starts to look like the evil sorceress is going to take over the world and remake it as she pleases. But then by chance a grieving family member of one of her early victims finds a special gift at just the right moment.
name: Opposite Day

description: Set in a modern Verona, the Montoyas and Capulets are warring assassin clans, serving contracts for Henry's, Hamlets and MacBeths. When Jo Capulet and Roman Montoya are thrown together after a mission gone wrong, they see in each other a chance for a new life, even if it means destroying everyone in their path.

Quest For The Ore Crystals

When evil scientist Dr. Kadoom returns from another dimension and zaps Professor Bozwald, the only person who can stop him, it's up to a couple of kids and their robotic friend to save the world. The Tall Tales of Talbot Toluca is not your typical book. It combines the high-impact visuals of graphic books while engaging the reader with hidden-object games, mazes and puzzles. Join Talbot and Damien in an out-of-this-world adventure that's sure to test your wits. Help them bring back Professor Bozwald and stop Dr. Kadoom from taking over the world. This book contains puzzles, hidden-object (where's waldo style) games and more!

Talbot Toluca #1 - Quest For The Ore Crystals is a Winner of the 2015 Moon Beam Children's Book Awards and 2015 National Indie Excellence Awards.
name: Quest For The Ore Crystals

volume.name: The Tall Tales of Talbot Toluca

description: Earth was quarantined fifty years ago. Since then, long-running political and cultural clashes between Mars and Venus have intensified. Talk of revolution permeates the ether. Private Sam Reegan must make a choice. Either follow orders and squelch the Venusian resistance... or take up arms against Martian hypocrisy. Humanity is on the threshold of interplanetary war!
Alan begins his journey to win back Betty.
name: Book 1

description: It's been 10 years since Zachariah Thorn inadvertently tore the veil between our world and the darkness beyond. Now his dark gift is his only weapon in his quest to banish the evil he has wrought. After being contacted by a despondent Stanislav, Zach finds himself venturing into the woods of Bulgaria in search of the clandestine Rusalka...
name: The Rusalka

description: Reprints Il Tromba #25 - Un generale, due dritti, due fiocche and Il Tromba #26 - La mansarda of the original series Il Tromba.
name: Un generale, due dritti, due ficone

description: Reprints Il Tromba #27 - Evviva i marescialli and Il Tromba #28 - Su con la vita, sergente! of the original series Il Tromba.
name: Evviva i marescialli

description: Reprints Il Tromba #33 - La fregata and Il Tromba #34 - La corsa campestre of the original series Il Tromba.
name: La fregata

description:
Reprints Il Tromba #29 - Miccichè si sposa and Il Tromba #30 - La cameriera of the original series Il Tromba.

The release date on page 2 ("January 1982") is wrong. This issues came out in February 1982.
name: Miccichè si sposa

description: Reprints Il Tromba #31 - Il gonzo della compagnia and Il Tromba #32 - Che sbronza, capitano of the original series Il Tromba.
name: Il gonzo della compagnia

description: Reprints Il Tromba #35 - Il capitano Caciotta and Il Tromba #36 - Sala d'attesa di 2a classe of the original series Il Tromba.
name: Il capitano Caciotta

description: Reprints Il Tromba #37 - Toccata e fi... pardon... fuga and Il Tromba #38 - La festa del reggimento of the original series Il Tromba.
name: Toccata e fi... pardon... fuga

description: Reprints Il Tromba #39 - Il signor Cozza e le sue due figlie and Il Tromba #40 - Donne e guai of the original series Il Tromba.
name: Il signor Cozza e le sue due figlie

description:
Although the War in Europe was over by June 1945, some groups of fanatical S.S. soldiers caused chaos for the occupying Allied forces. These rogue Nazis were known as "Werewolves" and would never surrender.

Major Rick Hogan of the Office of Strategic Services had a plan to deal with a ruthless Werewolf group who attacked army bases and robbed banks, preying on military and civilian targets alike. He would infiltrate them, using a German spy under his command, and bring down this guerrilla threat once and for all.
name: Day Of The Werewolf

description:
They were escaped prisoners-of-war, desperate to risk anything rather than be recaptured. They had even put on enemy uniforms, armed themselves with enemy weapons. There was nothing they would not do to avoid going back into captivity.

Introduction

A former Commando staffer once told me that he almost used to dread whenever the much-loved 1963 war film "The Great Escape" had been on television. Long before satellite movie channels, streaming, or even DVD, the antics of Steve McQueen, James Garner et al were solid, reliable Christmas/Easter/Bank Holiday entertainment on the British small screen.

The latest viewing usually led to a flurry of hopeful story synopses identical to the movie (as if the staff were unaware of it) or queries as to whether Commando had "done" that particular tale - and if not, why not?

So, as you'll see here, Commando does occasionally do prison camp stories but they have to be different to the aforementioned Hollywood classic. This one delivers the goods. It has a fairly dark edge, which is enforced by Ian Kennedy's magnificent, moody cover.

Scott Montgomery, Deputy Editor

First Published in January 1977 as issue number 1093, then in November 1990 as issue number 2419
name: Prisoners Of War
Joko Zuno das Karategirl - Die Fabrik der Vulkane

volume.name: Roy Rogers e o Trigger: Suplemento ao Mundo de Aventuras
Casper and Spooky in Screamland Giant Edition

deck: Tarzan Adventures was a British weekly series that consisted of reprinted comics strips, original stories and text pieces.
description: Professor Merit's Monster by Moorcock (this is the last known contribution by Moorcock)

volume.name: Superman y La Legión de Superhéroes
Zwarte humor & mannen in het wit
Classic Jonny Quest: The Devil's Tower

description: Journey back to the past in this all new-series set in the blockbuster Star Trek universe! While new characters head into Starfleet Academy, familiar faces join forces for the first time. Peek inside the all-ages adventure landing in comic shops this December!

Fans of horror rejoice, because Vigil is back and better than ever! Nina has a special place in the evolutionary ladder, she is the bridge between the alien Spider-Nation and humans. And her choices can help determine who controls the globe in the next century. Biologically part of both worlds, but not fully embraced by either, she is torn between the desire to help the Spider-Nation expand and the human's quest to rid the world of the greatest predators the Earth has seen! Drawn by the master of the macabre Tim Vigil and special assists from Adam McDaniel. The final pages are simply some of the finest of Tim Vigil's illustrious career! Originally presented in Tim Vigil Webwitch #1/2 & #1.
